name: Tiny
description: The dreamer who connects worlds through imagination. Tiny possesses the rare ability to traverse between the waking world and the dreamscape, bringing stories and ideas back and forth.

name: Isamu
description: Guardian of ancient wisdom and keeper of forgotten memories. A noble samurai warrior who has existed since the first dream was dreamt, collecting knowledge throughout the ages with his twin blades.

name: Luseira
description: Weaver of light who illuminates the darkest corners of dreams. Her presence brings clarity to confusion and hope to despair with her radiant golden energy.

name: Luneira
description: Twin spirit of moonlight who guides dreamers through the night. Where Luseira brings the light of day, Luneira commands the gentle glow of night, riding her ethereal unicorn companion.

name: Harvique
description: Collector of dream fragments and lost memories. A whimsical jester-like being who travels the dreamscape with multiple arms, gathering pieces of forgotten dreams to preserve them in his magical staff.

name: Galaras
description: Celestial navigator who charts courses through dream realms. With his planetary crown and clockwork heart, he helps dreamers find their way through the ever-changing cosmic landscape.

name: Prisma
description: Keeper of colors who paints emotions into the fabric of dreams. Her palette contains hues that exist nowhere else in any world.

name: Spectrum
description: Master of illusions who bends reality within the dreamscape. What seems impossible becomes possible in his presence.

name: Ren
description: Shapeshifter who moves between worlds with fluid grace. Ren can take any form imaginable, adapting to any dream environment.

name: Fisher
description: Collector of stories who fishes for tales in the sea of consciousness. Every dream has a story, and Fisher knows them all.

name: The Ancient Watcher
description: Eternal guardian who has witnessed the birth and death of countless dreams. Some say The Ancient Watcher was the first dreamer of all.
